title: In my neighbourhood, they are playing very loud music, so what should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s a tough one. Nobody should play their music so loud that you have to hear it, no matter what the time of day. That’s just common manners. Therefore, if they are doing it, they don’t have the same sense of common manners as you do. So….. if it is during the day, try to shut it out by wearing earphones or closing doors etc. if possible. If it’s so loud that you can’t even block it out, then your neighbors are not only ignorant of common manners, but they are also jerks. So judge your actions accordingly; they know where you live and when you are not there. If it is a one time Quincenera with a Mariachi Band that keeps going after your “Have to go to sleep, I got work” time, then call the police to ask them to tone it down. DENY you made the call. In general, make sure your doors and windows and walls. are good at blocking out noise, set aside a “my jerk neighbors” fund for having to use the A/C instead of open-air ventilation. Try to have a good relationship with your neighbors. Don’t narc on yourself for calling the police.
